QAPair.Question: What is (are) Pectus excavatum repair ?
QAPair.Answer: Pectus excavatum repair is surgery to correct pectus excavatum . This is a congenital (present at birth) deformity of the front of the chest wall that causes a sunken breastbone (sternum) and ribs. Pectus excavatum is also called funnel or sunken chest. It may worsen during the teen years.
